BluetoothStateIos: Bluetooth is turned OFF, please turn it ON from Control center
BluetoothStateAndroid: Bluetooth is turned OFF, please turn it ON from Quick settings menu

locationDisabled.message: Location services must be enabled for the scanning functionality

locationDenied.message: Location permission is required for the scanning functionality

status.connectingTimeout: It's taking a while to establish the connection. Is the other device open for connections?
status.exchangingDeviceInfoTimeout: It's taking a while to exchange device info. You may have to reconnect.
status.offline: Please connect to the internet to scan QR codes using Online sharing mode
status.sentHint: Waiting for receiver to save or discard your {{ vcLabel }}

sharing.title: Sharing...
sharing.hint: Please wait for the receiving device to accept or reject the share.
sharing.timeoutHint: It's taking longer than expected to share. There could be a problem with the connection.

accepted.title: Success!
accepted.message: Your Card has been successfully shared with Verifier

rejected.title: Notice
rejected.message: Your Card was discarded by Verifier

bleError.title: Failed to transfer
bleError.message: Something went wrong while transferring Card. Please try again.
